name: ec2console
description: A web UI for listing, starting, and stopping AWS EC2 instances.

scripts.start: AWS_CONFIG=.awsrc-dev nodemon server/server.js --exec babel-node & webpack --progress --colors --watch & autoless www/stylesheets; copyfiles -u 2 node_modules/bootstrap/fonts/* www
scripts.prepublish: babel server -d dist; webpack --progress --colors; lessc --source-map --verbose www/stylesheets/style.less www/stylesheets/style.css; copyfiles -u 2 server/views/* dist/views; copyfiles -u 2 node_modules/bootstrap/fonts/* www
scripts.clean: rimraf dist & rimraf www/stylesheets/*.css* & rimraf www/scripts/* & rimraf www/fonts

author: Chris Nitchie <cnitchie@gmail.com>
